message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to come down to $900,000, considering the significant value this product brings to you. This is my final offer, let me know if we can make a deal.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $875,000. This is my final offer, I hope we can reach an agreement.
